question: A haloalkane undergoes <katex>$S_{N}1$</katex> or <katex>$S_{N}2$</katex> reaction depending on : [cite: 201]
explanation: The mechanism (<katex>$S_N1$</katex> vs <katex>$S_N2$</katex>) is strongly influenced by the solvent (polar protic favors <katex>$S_N1$</katex>, polar aprotic favors <katex>$S_N2$</katex>) alongside substrate structure. The answer key points to Solvent used. [cite: 202, 204]
